name: Wandering Owl
description: You consider yourself a pro gamer? You succeded in killing the Dog in the famous game "Duck Hunt"? Well... This hardcore 2D platformer about unlucky life of little Owlet will put everything in its place. Can't complete it? Well, then you are not trying hard enough.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Dual Core 6600 @ 2.4GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 7750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Dual Core 6600 @ 2.4GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 7750 Storage: 200 MB available space
